citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:40 pm,
2:17 pm on 12-Apr-18.
Arrived at facility front gate closed and locked. Attempted to contact by phone and left message. Left business
card on the gate. Departed facility at 1:19 pm. Returned to facility at 2:17 pm. Attempted to contact by phone and
left message.
Additional Inspectors
Carlson Melissa, Veterinary Medical Officer
